body.directions: Read the phrases in Chinese, and then answer the question that follows.

body.quiz: Which of the following falls in the category indicated by the word presented?
body.answer: Audio for 冬天 dōngtiān
options: Audio for 苏打 sūdǎ
Audio for 女儿 nüér
Audio for 老师 lǎoshī
body.correct: You got it! 季节 jìjié means “season.” Of the four choices, only 冬天 dōngtiān (winter) is a season.
body.incorrect: Very close. Think about the meaning of this word, and which of the words listed is its kind in the audio.

body.directions: Read the phrases in Chinese, and then answer the question that follows.

body.quiz: Which of the following images best represent the word?
body.answer: Image of bird on a flowering tree with blossoms, indicating spring
options: Image of little girl, having fun in the summer in a swimming pool
Image of someone standing on fallen yellow maple leaves, indicating autumn
Image of winter landscape of the frozen pond and rime ice on the trees
body.correct: Outstanding! The words 春天 chūntiān means “spring,” and the first image vividly shows the promise of hope in the spring.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Think about what season the word represents, and then consider which image you are most likely to see during that season.

body.quiz: Which of the following characters can be used in place of the second character in the word presented, while keeping the same meaning?
body.correct: Terrific job! In the word 夏天 xiàtiān (summer), the 2nd character 天 tiān can be replaced with 季 jì, which itself is the first character for the word 季节 jìjié (season) to keep the same meaning.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Review the vocabulary chart above and its notes to see which character you’ve also just learned, which can be used to replace天tiān without changing the word’s meaning.

body.quiz: Which of the following activities will people most likely do during the season indicated by this word?
body.answer: Picking up colorful maple leaves in the woods
options: Swimming at the pool and having ice cream
Observing sprouting trees in the backyard
Going sledding with friends in the snow
body.correct: How outstanding! The word 秋天 qiūtiān means “autumn,” during which, people will most likely see lots of falling leaves with all colors. How beautiful!
body.incorrect: Not quite. Think about what season this word represents, and what typical activities people will most likely do during that season.
